title: Stay calm: Bitcoin whales are selling, but it’s no ‘sudden exodus’
summary: Analysts at Glassnode argue that the recent wave of Bitcoin whale sales is a typical part of a late-stage crypto cycle when older hands take profits.

title: Ban on rewards tied to stablecoin payments is un-American: Coinbase
summary: Coinbase Institute has criticized banking groups for asking regulators to prevent merchant rewards for stablecoin customers, arguing the request has no merit under the GENIUS Act.

title: Bitfarms plunges 18% after plan to wind down Bitcoin mining ops
summary: Bitfarms said it plans to shift its Bitcoin mining sites over the next two years and convert them to power AI, starting with its major site in Washington.

title: 3 reasons why Bitcoin and risk markets sold off: Is a recovery on the horizon?
summary: Bitcoin’s recent weakness mirrors broader economic uncertainty, as unreliable economic data and shifting expectations on US growth and policy cloud investor confidence.

title: Threshold: Upgraded bridge to funnel $500B institutional BTC into DeFi
summary: Threshold has introduced upgrades to its tBTC bridge, which it claims will better position the $500 billion worth of Bitcoin held by institutions and whales to access DeFi opportunities.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: MoonPay launches enterprise stablecoin suite with M0, taps ex-Paxos leaders
summary: The move pushes MoonPay deeper into stablecoin infrastructure, giving issuers a ready-made stack for launching fully backed digital dollars across multiple chains.

title: XRP ETF launches with strong trading volume, but prices fall flat
summary: The XRP ETF launch is on track to be one of the hottest crypto ETF launches in 2025, but asset prices also dipped on launch day.

title: Cash App to unlock stablecoin transactions ’soon’
summary: Reports suggested that the feature unlocked by the financial transaction app could roll out in early 2026.

title: Ether’s chance of turning bullish before 2025 ends depends on 4 critical factors
summary: Ether’s struggle to reclaim $4,000 is the result of weakening onchain activity, a decline in fees and competition from Solana, BNB Chain and upcoming altcoin ETFs.
